name: Magnet Head
description:
Magnet Head! A Zombie-Shooter without the control of aiming.

Your head will be attracted to the closest metal object in the room and shoot in that direction. 

You can purchase Power-Ups at Vending Machines.

Survive the Plant-Zombie Horde and become a "Magnificent" Hero!

Controls

Keyboard---Move(WASD), Shoot(Left-Click)

Controller---Move(Left Joystick), Shoot(Right Trigger)
